04a39bfe-9872-49f4-846b-7ae5eb1f950e.name: Wedge Antilles
04a39bfe-9872-49f4-846b-7ae5eb1f950e.text: When attacking, reduce the defender's agility value by 1 (to a minimum of "0").

ab6d8ebd-68b3-46a7-8865-58b8d33dea89.name: Garven Dreis
ab6d8ebd-68b3-46a7-8865-58b8d33dea89.text: After spending a focus token, you may place that token on any other friendly ship at Range 1-2 (instead of discarding it).

790a7555-4043-45f1-b0f7-fbc5477caaf5.name: Biggs Darklighter
790a7555-4043-45f1-b0f7-fbc5477caaf5.text: Other friendly ships at Range 1 cannot be targeted by attacks if the attacker could target you instead.

9c507145-094b-448b-a3b2-841dba85e459.name: Luke Skywalker
9c507145-094b-448b-a3b2-841dba85e459.text: When defending, you may change 1 of your results to a result.

b2fc7765-f377-4b11-8f45-660fd80e10f5.name: "Dutch" Vander
b2fc7765-f377-4b11-8f45-660fd80e10f5.text: After acquiring a target lock, choose another friendly ship at Range 1-2.  The chosen ship may immediately acquire a target lock.

398be93b-54ba-4b0c-a0ed-49861a9cf988.name: Horton Salm
398be93b-54ba-4b0c-a0ed-49861a9cf988.text: When attacking at Range 2-3, you may reroll any of your blank results.

45b9c885-8ddc-4b85-8538-c3c4915a37f4.name: "Winged Gundark"
45b9c885-8ddc-4b85-8538-c3c4915a37f4.text: When attacking at Range 1, you may change 1 of your results to a result.

ec01b464-df57-451f-b9b6-ddd5e587744d.name: "Night Beast"
ec01b464-df57-451f-b9b6-ddd5e587744d.text: After executing a green maneuver, you may perform a free focus action.

67671a97-f61b-420b-b57d-4994fb5f0902.name: "Backstabber"
67671a97-f61b-420b-b57d-4994fb5f0902.text: When attacking from outside the defender's firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

c654c70e-a8da-40e4-a66f-caf3c8d367a8.name: "Dark Curse"
c654c70e-a8da-40e4-a66f-caf3c8d367a8.text: When defending, ships attacking you cannot spend focus tokens or reroll attack dice.

a4ee23d3-4734-4873-8dfb-ba62e8c2cc33.name: "Mauler Mithel"
a4ee23d3-4734-4873-8dfb-ba62e8c2cc33.text: When attacking at Range 1, roll 1 additional attack die.

004320b1-048e-4689-b7f8-47494feae5fa.name: "Howlrunner"
004320b1-048e-4689-b7f8-47494feae5fa.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is attacking with its primary weapon, it may reroll 1 attack die.

178a1ed1-e220-4384-9511-dc66ec7c0cb0.name: Maarek Stele
178a1ed1-e220-4384-9511-dc66ec7c0cb0.text: When your attack deals a faceup Damage card to the defender, instead draw 3 Damage cards, choose 1 to deal, and discard the others.

53bf1fc4-dd45-4e85-9cdc-5489f8ffcd2c.name: Darth Vader
53bf1fc4-dd45-4e85-9cdc-5489f8ffcd2c.text: During your "Perform Action" step, you may perform 2 actions.

384c776b-be0c-4155-b3dd-073594e2ccf1.name: "Fel's Wrath"
384c776b-be0c-4155-b3dd-073594e2ccf1.text: When the number of Damage cards assigned to you equals or exceeds your hull value, you are not destroyed until the end of the Combat phase.

8fa731d2-c123-464d-9594-0479b7730787.name: Turr Phennir
8fa731d2-c123-464d-9594-0479b7730787.text: After you perform an attack, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

24fb4f63-4bd9-4bcc-ac72-53fdd4e6e45a.name: Soontir Fel
24fb4f63-4bd9-4bcc-ac72-53fdd4e6e45a.text: When you receive a stress token, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

20a215a3-4e33-4021-8006-d80df7ddfb9c.name: Tycho Celchu
20a215a3-4e33-4021-8006-d80df7ddfb9c.text: You may perform actions even while you have stress tokens.

0e9d898d-22cc-490e-80a9-524c15b78c7f.name: Arvel Crynyd
0e9d898d-22cc-490e-80a9-524c15b78c7f.text: You may declare an enemy ship inside your firing arc that you are touching as the target of your attack.

25fefaa6-fba0-4f37-a7c1-1447b0c459a7.name: Chewbacca
25fefaa6-fba0-4f37-a7c1-1447b0c459a7.text: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, immediately flip it facedown (without resolving its ability).

30044e2a-246f-48c2-9438-5661557a3367.name: Lando Calrissian
30044e2a-246f-48c2-9438-5661557a3367.text: After you execute a green maneuver, choose 1 other friendly ship at Range 1.  That ship may perform 1 free action shown on its action bar.

9b2c2897-b008-4843-9cf3-72d96da259b7.name: Han Solo
9b2c2897-b008-4843-9cf3-72d96da259b7.text: When attacking, you may reroll all of your dice.  If you choose to do so, you must reroll as many of your dice as possible.

5f5d5281-5167-46c7-aa33-49029b636679.name: Kath Scarlet
5f5d5281-5167-46c7-aa33-49029b636679.text: When attacking, the defender receives 1 stress token if he cancels at least 1 result.

bb503cf4-a961-4f22-8b50-a29e76209d4a.name: Boba Fett
bb503cf4-a961-4f22-8b50-a29e76209d4a.text: When you reveal a bank maneuver ( or ), you may rotate your dial to the other bank maneuver of the same speed.

2a75c443-393a-4e65-8fb6-f22200aa04d3.name: Krassis Trelix
2a75c443-393a-4e65-8fb6-f22200aa04d3.text: When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may reroll 1 attack die.

5c4e3ad2-1a9b-4847-ab2c-aa9dddcdde86.name: Ten Numb
5c4e3ad2-1a9b-4847-ab2c-aa9dddcdde86.text: When attacking, 1 of your results cannot be canceled by defense dice.

b4131bd5-a23d-4d2d-833c-9e49b05c7f1b.name: Ibtisam
b4131bd5-a23d-4d2d-833c-9e49b05c7f1b.text: When attacking or defending, if you have at least 1 stress token, you may reroll 1 of your dice.

1cf26cde-56bc-42b6-8ade-5f61b6bada4b.name: Roark Garnet
1cf26cde-56bc-42b6-8ade-5f61b6bada4b.text: At the start of the Combat phase, choose 1 other friendly ship at Range 1-3.  Until the end of the phase, treat that ship's pilot skill value as "12."

9a1d6795-8893-4a73-b661-95c62aa2e933.name: Kyle Katarn
9a1d6795-8893-4a73-b661-95c62aa2e933.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may assign 1 of your focus tokens to another friendly ship at Range 1-3.

e3411b35-1961-459b-a3cf-3d6faad6291f.name: Jan Ors
e3411b35-1961-459b-a3cf-3d6faad6291f.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1-3 is attacking, if you have no stress tokens, you may receive 1 stress token to allow that ship to roll 1 additional attack die.

b6693079-1a0a-4ca7-85e2-f2ef9b360fae.name: Captain Jonus
b6693079-1a0a-4ca7-85e2-f2ef9b360fae.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1 attacks with a secondary weapon, it may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

487c8102-55b2-4ca1-b90e-8fb61078d64a.name: Major Rhymer
487c8102-55b2-4ca1-b90e-8fb61078d64a.text: When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may increase or decrease the weapon range by 1 to a limit of Range 1-3.

eed04f0c-ec39-4c9b-9b90-02a903c56cbe.name: Captain Kagi
eed04f0c-ec39-4c9b-9b90-02a903c56cbe.text: When an enemy ship acquires a target lock, it must lock onto your ship if able.

e89eded9-ef3f-4e04-8c6c-2c8eea06241e.name: Colonel Jendon
e89eded9-ef3f-4e04-8c6c-2c8eea06241e.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may assign 1 of your blue target lock tokens to a friendly ship at Range 1 if it does not have a blue target lock token.

2008c66c-cb0e-4be7-b665-2c8de6c5e37a.name: Captain Yorr
2008c66c-cb0e-4be7-b665-2c8de6c5e37a.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1-2 would receive a stress token, if you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you may receive that token instead.

882dde0f-5c9a-4e7d-b658-9acb16f597c7.name: Lieutenant Lorrir
882dde0f-5c9a-4e7d-b658-9acb16f597c7.text: When performing a barrel roll action, you may receive 1 stress token to use the ( 1) or ( 1) template instead of the ( 1) template.

a1c01c18-a353-404c-a228-3cdce8648e13.name: Tetran Cowall
a1c01c18-a353-404c-a228-3cdce8648e13.text: When you reveal a maneuver, you may treat the speed of that maneuver as "1," "3," or "5".

ee9a61b7-c4f7-4701-bd1d-926572bf9107.name: Kir Kanos
ee9a61b7-c4f7-4701-bd1d-926572bf9107.text: When attacking at Range 2-3, you may spend 1 evade token to add 1 result to your roll.

6f8a9416-c32f-46b5-9d96-24c59651fba7.name: Carnor Jax
6f8a9416-c32f-46b5-9d96-24c59651fba7.text: Enemy ships at Range 1 cannot perform focus or evade actions and cannot spend focus or evade tokens.

155f3bf9-19f4-4ea2-9221-860745df6fe0.name: Lieutenant Blount
155f3bf9-19f4-4ea2-9221-860745df6fe0.text: When attacking, the defender is hit by your attack, even if he does not suffer any damage.

7fcafc7c-2ff1-482f-bbfc-644c8f959005.name: Airen Cracken
7fcafc7c-2ff1-482f-bbfc-644c8f959005.text: After you perform an attack, you may choose another friendly ship at Range 1.  That ship may perform 1 free action.

61b2d9a9-d2ad-4a4e-9e59-3bbaba2d50eb.name: Colonel Vessery
61b2d9a9-d2ad-4a4e-9e59-3bbaba2d50eb.text: When attacking, immediately after you roll attack dice, you may acquire a target lock on the defender if it already has a red target lock token.

880da074-b274-4f8d-a068-13daa6e580a8.name: Rexler Brath
880da074-b274-4f8d-a068-13daa6e580a8.text: After you perform an attack that deals at least 1 Damage card to the defender, you may spend a focus token to flip those cards faceup.

63f360e0-4b8f-4ea5-9753-8f250eb9952e.name: Etahn A'baht
63f360e0-4b8f-4ea5-9753-8f250eb9952e.text: When an enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-3 is defending, the attacker may change 1 of its results to a result.

dab06eab-f93d-40db-b2f9-87f1d3987771.name: Corran Horn
dab06eab-f93d-40db-b2f9-87f1d3987771.text: At the start of the End phase, you may perform one attack.  You cannot attack during the next round.

54743c77-712a-4b25-aee4-27a5b680dd2f.name: "Echo"
54743c77-712a-4b25-aee4-27a5b680dd2f.text: When you decloak, you must use the ( 2) or ( 2) template instead of the ( 2) template.

8da97e0f-4b36-4fda-8792-6de5094e9bf8.name: "Whisper"
8da97e0f-4b36-4fda-8792-6de5094e9bf8.text: After you perform an attack that hits, you may assign 1 focus to your ship.

8774ea72-d8c7-46cd-b5e9-4e6221db932d.name: CR90 Corvette (Fore)
8774ea72-d8c7-46cd-b5e9-4e6221db932d.text: When attacking with your primary weapon, you may spend 1 energy to roll 1 additional attack die.

a380b78f-635b-44c7-85f2-52c18a327c95.name: Wes Janson
a380b78f-635b-44c7-85f2-52c18a327c95.text: After you perform an attack, you may remove 1 focus, evade, or blue target lock token from the defender.

b2258922-21dc-4bc1-9548-80374aed6c8f.name: Jek Porkins
b2258922-21dc-4bc1-9548-80374aed6c8f.text: When you receive a stress token, you may remove it and roll 1 attack die. On a result, deal 1 facedown Damage card to this ship.

667b67fc-8275-49ff-a761-fabf5d5cd128.name: "Hobbie" Klivian
667b67fc-8275-49ff-a761-fabf5d5cd128.text: When you acquire or spend a target lock, you may remove 1 stress token from your ship.

3b783dd3-ca4f-4c0f-b2ee-226f53f45e1c.name: Tarn Mison
3b783dd3-ca4f-4c0f-b2ee-226f53f45e1c.text: When an enemy ship declares you as the target of an attack, you may acquire a target lock on that ship.

6e255d5f-f7fc-4234-ab5b-5ba13492fef6.name: Jake Farrell
6e255d5f-f7fc-4234-ab5b-5ba13492fef6.text: After you perform a focus action or are assigned a focus token, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

9f440089-c14b-424f-b692-61813181b223.name: Gemmer Sojan
9f440089-c14b-424f-b692-61813181b223.text: While you are at Range 1 of at least 1 enemy ship, increase your agility value by 1.

c72bfaf2-1894-459f-ae07-5e8198e5358e.name: Keyan Farlander
c72bfaf2-1894-459f-ae07-5e8198e5358e.text: When attacking, you may remove 1 stress token to change all of your results to results.

0ab09b8f-2020-4785-b084-a8dded2b354e.name: Nera Dantels
0ab09b8f-2020-4785-b084-a8dded2b354e.text: You can perform secondary weapon attacks against enemy ships outside your firing arc.

cf65a5fd-667c-4695-8f88-6300abd31eab.name: Eaden Vrill
cf65a5fd-667c-4695-8f88-6300abd31eab.text: When performing a primary weapon attack against a stressed ship, roll 1 additional attack die.

eebc028b-bdf3-45f6-9301-1afe2e1ae9a0.name: "Leebo"
eebc028b-bdf3-45f6-9301-1afe2e1ae9a0.text: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, draw 1 additional Damage card, choose 1 to resolve, and discard the other.

6553537e-c838-4eac-ba86-f6a8fef71b55.name: Dash Rendar
6553537e-c838-4eac-ba86-f6a8fef71b55.text: You may ignore obstacles during the Activation phase and when performing actions.

6cdab59d-7633-4433-8735-fe380074be79.name: Captain Oicunn
6cdab59d-7633-4433-8735-fe380074be79.text: After executing a maneuver, each enemy ship you are touching suffers 1 damage.

f04b2317-3e44-41fd-ac2f-b8e5913931f1.name: Commander Kenkirk
f04b2317-3e44-41fd-ac2f-b8e5913931f1.text: If you have no shields and at least 1 Damage card assigned to you, increase your agility value by 1.

c9335a90-fd06-4cd5-81b6-5baadb3115c4.name: Rear Admiral Chiraneau
c9335a90-fd06-4cd5-81b6-5baadb3115c4.text: When attacking at Range 1-2, you may change 1 of your results to a result.

9b850959-08c9-4f7e-ad15-06e9d9f98cfc.name: Prince Xizor
9b850959-08c9-4f7e-ad15-06e9d9f98cfc.text: When defending, a friendly ship at Range 1 may suffer 1 uncanceled or result instead of you.

e52ec511-1e75-41ce-9745-e571dd8c0718.name: Guri
e52ec511-1e75-41ce-9745-e571dd8c0718.text: At the start of the Combat phase, if you are at Range 1 of an enemy ship, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

88377cb0-ed60-4083-8a97-3e0ecfcb268d.name: Serissu
88377cb0-ed60-4083-8a97-3e0ecfcb268d.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is defending, it may reroll 1 defense die.

9b00570f-f699-4104-b813-7dbbb42584b4.name: Laetin A'shera
9b00570f-f699-4104-b813-7dbbb42584b4.text: After you defend against an attack, if the attack did not hit, you may assign 1 evade token to your ship.

5cc92a31-50e4-492b-b00d-cee54fd5aef4.name: IG-88A
5cc92a31-50e4-492b-b00d-cee54fd5aef4.text: This card has not yet been revealed.

5e1dd9b8-8ad3-48cc-ae98-3423c91330da.name: IG-88B
5e1dd9b8-8ad3-48cc-ae98-3423c91330da.text: This card has not yet been revealed.

27df7aec-0c60-4fa7-899e-358272745c12.name: IG-88C
27df7aec-0c60-4fa7-899e-358272745c12.text: This card has not yet been revealed.

0afb9026-0c1c-4cd2-b29f-926446efa9f1.name: IG-88D
0afb9026-0c1c-4cd2-b29f-926446efa9f1.text: You may execute the ( 3) or ( 3) maneuver using the corresponding ( 3) or ( 3) template.

54fe27a9-d52c-46cf-90b7-b07766442d09.name: N'Dru Suhlak
54fe27a9-d52c-46cf-90b7-b07766442d09.text: When attacking, if there are no other friendly ships at Range 1-2, roll 1 additional attack die.

c20436e4-a633-4c0d-81ae-dab248cf9c06.name: Kaa'To Leeachos
c20436e4-a633-4c0d-81ae-dab248cf9c06.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may remove 1 focus or evade token from another friendly ship at Range 1-2 and assign it to yourself.

3faedccc-59b8-4d9e-8e9d-34aefce5e027.name: Boba Fett (Scum)
3faedccc-59b8-4d9e-8e9d-34aefce5e027.text: When attacking or defending, you may reroll 1 of your dice for each enemy ship at Range 1.

1ba3a7d1-f176-40f8-8159-65101102370b.name: Kath Scarlet (Scum)
1ba3a7d1-f176-40f8-8159-65101102370b.text: When attacking a ship inside your auxiliary firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

2a838bf1-5544-4b6d-acf2-a13d1bb8afef.name: Emon Azzameen
2a838bf1-5544-4b6d-acf2-a13d1bb8afef.text: When dropping a bomb, you may use the [ 3], [ 3], or [ 3] template instead of the [ 1] template.

58c7e1d4-275b-4738-b331-7cd606bdf58b.name: Kavil
58c7e1d4-275b-4738-b331-7cd606bdf58b.text: When attacking a ship outside your firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

b74cca55-662d-40db-ba4f-579a57b9edd1.name: Drea Renthal
b74cca55-662d-40db-ba4f-579a57b9edd1.text: After you spend a target lock, you may receive 1 stress token to acquire a target lock.

048a589c-bc1a-40ce-90e6-6d1767cef507.name: Dace Bonearm
048a589c-bc1a-40ce-90e6-6d1767cef507.text: When an enemy ship at Range 1-3 receives at least 1 ion token, if you are not stressed, you may receive 1 stress token to cause that ship to suffer 1 damage.

f0947c4d-1271-415f-bfd7-e27e74611c9a.name: Palob Godalhi
f0947c4d-1271-415f-bfd7-e27e74611c9a.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may remove 1 focus or evade token from an enemy ship at Range 1-2 and assign it to yourself.

8a7460d4-74f2-415f-abd4-100a4a8022a7.name: Torkil Mux
8a7460d4-74f2-415f-abd4-100a4a8022a7.text: At the end of the Activation phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1-2. Until the end of the Combat phase, treat that ship's pilot skill value as "0".

1f22a7c4-06e1-46ce-9ee8-1e74c0fb3ee0.name: Commander Alozen
1f22a7c4-06e1-46ce-9ee8-1e74c0fb3ee0.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may acquire a target lock on an enemy ship at Range 1.
